summary: Refactored validate_required_pseudo_headers to reduce nesting from 4 levels to 2 levels by using early returns and separating CONNECT validation into distinct guard clauses. All HTTP/2 tests pass with sanitizers enabled.
changes_made: Separated extended CONNECT and standard CONNECT validation into separate guard clauses
Used early returns to eliminate else branches and reduce nesting
Added RFC references (RFC 8441 for extended CONNECT, RFC 9113 Section 8.5 for standard)
Leveraged existing helper functions http2_validate_standard_connect() and http2_validate_extended_connect()
